thread.title: BRIEF-Potbelly Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.29

title: BRIEF-Potbelly Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.29
text: 04 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Potbelly Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.29 Reuters Staff Feb 23 (Reuters) - Potbelly Corp: * REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH FISCAL QUARTER AND FULL FISCAL YEAR 2017 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.29 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 9.6 PERCENT TO $112.1 MILLION * Q4 SAME STORE SALES FELL 2.4 PERCENT * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37 TO $0.39 * QTRLY COMPANY-OPERATED COMPARABLE STORE SALES DECREASED 2.4%, ADJUSTING FOR IMPACT OF 14TH WEEK * SEES 2018 FLAT COMPANY-OPERATED COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH * SEES FLAT COMPANY-OPERATED COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH IN 2018 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08, REVENUE VIEW $112.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.36 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
